verses.text_plain: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
verses.verse_html: 1This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

verses.text_plain: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
verses.verse_html: 2For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

verses.text_plain: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
verses.verse_html: 3Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,

tokens.text: despisers of those that are good

verses.text_plain: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
verses.verse_html: 4Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;

verses.text_plain: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
verses.verse_html: 5Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

verses.text_plain: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
verses.verse_html: 6For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,

verses.text_plain: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
verses.verse_html: 7Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

verses.text_plain: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
verses.verse_html: 8Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

verses.text_plain: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
verses.verse_html: 9But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

verses.text_plain: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
verses.verse_html: 10But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

verses.text_plain: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
verses.verse_html: 11Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.

verses.text_plain: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
verses.verse_html: 12Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

verses.text_plain: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
verses.verse_html: 13But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.

verses.text_plain: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
verses.verse_html: 14But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;

verses.text_plain: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
verses.verse_html: 15And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.text_plain: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.verse_html: 16All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:

verses.text_plain: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.verse_html: 17That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
